metadata.Title: CVE-2015-6247 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The dissect_openflow_tablemod_v5 function inepan/dissectors/packet-openflow_v5.c in the OpenFlow dissector in Wireshark1.12.x before 1.12.7 does not validate a certain offset value, which allowsremote attackers to cause a denial of service (infinite loop) via a craftedpacket.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-6247` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libwireshark-data - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
libwireshark11 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
libwiretap8 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
libwscodecs2 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
libwsutil9 - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
tshark - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
wireshark - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
wireshark-common - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
wireshark-gtk - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
wireshark-qt - 2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wireshark package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.6.3-1~ubuntu18.04.1').
